attributes.review: I repeat this is sooo BAD! I’ve never had an app so bad than this. First off when I downloaded the app it had trump on it 🤢 and if that wasn’t bad enough, it gives you bad luck, for 5 years !!! Wonder how I know this ? Bc I have bad luck !!! My fridge ran away !!! And I’m blaming it on the app. And also this app makes u have depression, it’s just an horrible add and it needs to be taken off ASAP!!!. Since they wanna delete tiktik😤😑
attributes.title: HORRIBLE DOSENT WORK !!!

attributes.review: I had downloaded this app in hopes of watching through the President’s campaign. However within in instant of loading the app, nonstop glitches kept happening, even when I get out of the app. I would advise that no one downloads this app so they don’t experience this. And the programmers of the app, instead of fixing the glitches, I believe deleting this app all together is the best way to go.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.userName: NO VOTE BC OF TIKTOK BAN
attributes.review: I wil no longer be voting for trump due to the tik tok ban. He is just mad that people on the app are messing with his election. He is trying to make it seem as an urgent national security problem when there are way bigger problem has ignored. Tik tok is a part of American culture it is a way to share creativity and experience. I am very mad about this ban so Donald will not only be getting a review for his app to be deleted but he will no longer get a vote.
attributes.title: TIK TOK BAN

attributes.review: When you first open the app everything is fine and dandy but after ten minutes it was glitching like crazy. I had to hard restart my phone and it completely messed up my battery my phone dies really fast now and everything goes so slow. Very disappointed with the quality of the app😡I want payment for a new phone!!!
attributes.title: App is terrible

attributes.review: um. the app is really disturbing. i opened the app thinking it was for obama. but it wasn’t. instead there was an orange cheeto on my screen. it was really disturbing. now there are tiny cheetos with small dicks outside my window screaming racist slurs. not to mention the layout of the app is just terrible it makes one want to stab themself in the eyes over and over. the colors, disgusting. i also saw something abt “ make america great again” and i don’t like. don’t know what that’s abt pls take it down. anyways don’t like the app, terrible don’t know why it’s a thing. you might as well just delete the entire thing. anywho don’t download the app unless you want to throw up🌸👀❤️🦋💦✨🍉🧚🏽.
attributes.title: don’t like the app.

attributes.review: i decided that it was time to expand the platforms i follow trump with, so i downloaded this app. Everything was fine for a few days until i noticed that my phone was taking longer and longer to load! Following my phone slowing down, my phone started glitching and getting really hot! the only reason could be this terrible app! this is completely unacceptable!
attributes.title: VIRUS!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking nothing of it, but now I wish I never had. I opened the app and it called me a “fugly $lut” :(  probably just a glitch in the software but it’s very hurtful :( then to make matters even worse, it began to disrupt the other apps on my phone! They all crash when I open them. And now my phone makes fart noises every 13 minutes. Do not download!!!!
attributes.title: Shocked and Disappointed

attributes.review: I was giving my pet goldfish a walk down the side walk and then this huge dinosaur came up and ate him then the dinosaur chased me all the way back to my house. After that the top of the dinosaurs head came off and guess who was in it? JUSTIN BEIBER!!! I said “no way” then I ran outside just to see taylor swift!! They both then chased me more and more then a ufo came and abducted me and the person who was driving the ufo? THE TRUMP APP. Never came back. Worst app ever.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to find a reason to vote for our “president” but honestly if I vote all I am doing is putting our lives at risk because all he does is worry about people not showing up to his birthday when he should be worrying about how to get America back together and put a stop to this virus if he wins another 4 years in office he’s going to destroy this country more than he already has.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: this app keeps messing up my phone like glitchs and deleting apps ever since I downloaded it, you can try and fix but from the reviews it received I don’t think it’s gonna change so just do us all a favor and delete it please you get sued for allowing to app to jack up people phone that we payed a lot of money for.
